original_title: RSC Live: The Taming of the Shrew
overview: Live from Stratford-upon-Avon. The Royal Shakespeare Company presents The Taming of the Shrew. Turning Shakespeareâ€™s fierce, energetic comedy of gender and materialism on its head to offer a fresh perspective on its portrayal of hierarchy and power.
title: RSC Live: The Taming of the Shrew
